benchmark_details.name: Ref-A VSBench
benchmark_details.overview: Ref-A VSBench is a dataset for Referring Audio-Visual Segmentation which aims to segment specific objects in videos based on natural language expressions involving audio, vision, and text information.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for evaluating methods on the Referring Audio-Visual Segmentation task.

data.source: Ref-A VSBench dataset with three subsets: Seen, Unseen, and Null.

methodology.interpretation: Higher J and F indicate better segmentation performance; lower S indicates less false positives.
